Even though I'm not a huge fan of games with a dedicated story I absolutely LOVED Portal 2. I actually played Portal 2 before playing Portal and with a little help of Google I figured out the whole story.

The game is really good, in terms of puzzles, you have to think a lot in some test chambers and in some parts of the Aperture labs (I actually had to look up for walkthroughs in some parts). There are some easter eggs that refer to Portal and Half-Life (if I'm not mistaken) and it's really fun to play.

In terms of story I actually didn't like the very end (just before the credits) because I feel that it stays short, but the ending overall is good. And after this game I don't really feel that Valve will launch a 3rd part (but who knows).

It is an excellent game and I don't think that playing this game before the 1st one matters, although you should then play the 1st part just to fill in the blanks.
Excellent
хорошая игра

It´s good but sometimes too hard so it started to be boring.

Having never played a Portal game before, I was a bit reluctant to start this one. I didn't have any prior knowledge of the story and was going in blind. That didn't matter because I was rewarded with an excellent adventure with amazing puzzles, humor and storytelling with some cheeky twists and surprizes. Engaging and thrilling, it shouldn't disappoint anyone - even those who are not into FPS-puzzle games.

Радость, страх, веселье, обида, злорадство и светлая грусть. Ничто, согласитесь, не говорит об игре так емко, как яркие эмоции, возникшие в процессе ее прохождения. 
Portal 2 - одна из игр, удивляющих не техническим совершенством, не проработанностью мира и не досконально прописанными характерами персонажей. Она цепляет атмосферностью, юмором и чувством единства с управляемым персонажем. Именно эти качества делают ее милой сердцу любого, кто хоть раз ее запустил. 
Карты, порой представляющие собой настоящий интеллектуальный вызов игроку, головокружительные пролеты сквозь термические лучи и проход по мостам, сделанным из света над черной бездной, один взгляд в которую вызывает приступ паники - все это Portal 2. Неожиданный шедевр, одна из лучших игр за всю историю и самая трогательная концовка, что я видел.
∞ из 10
great fun!

Portal 2 is like a flower you water everyday, and each day that passes you look at it amazed and wonder just how much will it grow on you.

Besides a brilliant solo campaign, packed with superb voice acting, challenging riddles that englobe a unique gameplay, a interesting story and a overall lengthy ride, it also boasts one of the most well thought/executed multiplayer co'op moments in videogame history, that invite you to create and overcome challenges.

It's made me find love, friendship, care, patience, hope and persistance. Perfect game to play with someone you enjoy in your life, be it a friend or a lover and to reinforce that relationship.

To summarize, it's a fantastic game, and I would recommend it to any creature that shows interest in playing videogames.

I've jumped on the Portal bandwagon a few years late, but after thoroughly enjoying the physics defying experience of Portal I pretty much went straight on to Portal 2, uncertain of how I would feel about the game in comparison to Portal. 

I needn't have had any doubts. Yes it is a quite a different game but in this case it's worked wonderfully. After the fairly minimalistic plot of Portal it was great to see the story of Aperture Science fleshed out as I played through the game. The environments I encountered along the way were pretty breath taking and I really enjoyed some of the mechanics that weren't present in Portal. 

I did find some of the puzzles extremely difficult to get my head around but that's mostly because I'm a bit dense in that department. If your brain works the same way as mine you may find yourself frequently understanding what you're supposed to do with each individual piece of a puzzle, but not quite being able to put them altogether. Just be prepared for the possibility of needing to seek help from the interwebs for a few things.

The co-op chambers are a lot of fun and the little Easter eggs throughout the game really add to the background detail.

При прохождении возникли трудности, которые мы с друзьями решали по нескольку часов, но это того стоило, ведь на то это и головоломка!

「Portal」シリーズの第２作目。
どこでもドアのように空間を繋げ、様々なギミックを解きステージをクリアしていくパズルゲーム。しかしただのパズルゲームと思うなかれ、このゲームはストーリーも素晴らしい。
是非、1作目2作目どちらもプレイして頂きたい

Portal 2 e' "semplicemente" Portal 1 ma all'ennesima potenza. E no non e' usato con eufemismo: ennesima potenza e' la potenza giusta! xD Il primo gioco era un fantastico puzzle game con ALLA FINE una storia (chi lo ha giocato capira'). Questo gioco invece la storia te la sputa in faccia dal primo momento e non ti lascia mai, rendendo il risolvere le stanze parte di qualcosa di piu' grande. Grande doppiaggio, grande umorismo, gioco perfetto!

最早言わずもがなかもしれないが、非常に良質なパズルゲーム。
『ポータルガン』と呼ばれる不思議な装置で、離れた2つの平面を繋ぎ、それによって本来であれば空間的に攻略不能なステージを攻略していく。
日常的には先ず使うことの無い思考法と、その実現手段を手にして解くパズルは、他の何者にも変えがたい感覚を与えてくれるだろう。
『２』と銘打たれているので、基本的に前作の続きである。前作を知っていればニヤリとできる小話や、前半のステージ構造等、前作『Portal』をプレイしている事が前提の構成になっているため、前作をプレイする事を勧める。
ただ、プレイボリュームや仕掛けの面白さは前作よりも優秀であるため、『ポータルガン』を用いたアクションパズルゲームとしてのみ『Portal』に興味があるという人であれば(ストーリーはどうででもいいなら)今作からプレイしても問題は無い。
ただ、『Portal』が好きな人間として、前作のプレイを強く勧めたい。

For an older game, Portal 2 has some real staying power. One of the best features, in my opinion, has to be the map creation software. I really enjoy creating "test chambers" and then up-loading them to Steam or grabbing a few from the commuinity and working through them, and then seeing if I can solve them in ways that the designer never intended.

In an era where high-profile games are getting more and more horribly and gratuitously violent, playing Portal 2 is such a refreshing experience. It is styled as a first-person shooter but is a puzzle game of the very highest order. Why? It teaches you brilliantly.

On top of this, it is the funniest game yet made. Stephen Merchant's Wheatley is the undoubted star but he is given a surprising run for his money by J.K. Simmons' Cave Johnson, both delivering their dialogue beyond brilliantly.

Graphics are fantastic with some spectacular level deformation and great lighting effects as the levels construct themselves around you.

That said, loading times are horrendous; it frequently feels like the loading takes longer than the puzzle. It very much breaks the atmosphere though the game is so strong that it immediately regains it once the gaming restarts.

Oh, and then it has probably the greatest gameplay ending in video game history. This is, well, a bit special.

Bom, em vez de eu simplesmente dizer que esse foi um dos melhores jogos da minha vida, resolvi editar essa análise e mostrar realmente motivos de porque este É um dos melhores jogos da minha vida :)

A Orange Box foi meu segundo jogo da Steam, e uma das minhas primeiras aquisições quando comecei ter meu próprio dinheiro. Pra mim, a Orange Box era algo revolucionário: eram 5 jogos completos em um só pacote. Era incrível. Eu comprei pra poder finalmente jogar a saga HL2 e poder começar a fazer meus mapas no CS:S... mas o que de fato chamou minha atenção foi um jogo diferente que estava espremido entre TF2 e HL: este jogo era Portal.

Lembro que apenas abri e comecei a jogar. Não tinha visto review nenhum na internet, não sabia nem do que se tratava. Meu inglês na época ainda era meio porco, então tinha dificuldade de entender a história direito. Meu PC da época também era um lixo, então o jogo rodava a 15fps, no low. E, mesmo com esses problemas, eu fui me encantando por Portal. Era diferente, era sombrio, era inteligente, era misterioso, era desafiador... Era do caralho!

Em uma tacada só eu fechei o jogo. Fiquei admirado. O final foi incrível. Eu queria mais.
E em 2011, finalmente, veio mais. A experiência que tive com Portal 1 foi única, fantástica, e minha expectativa pro 2 estava muito alta. E a Valve não decepcionou.

O que fizeram com Portal 2 foi simplesmente genial. Eles pegaram um universo rico e cheio de possibilidades, e melhoraram em milhares de vezes. A história ficou impecável. Todo progresso em si, como o plot te envolve, te faz sentir raiva, pena, tristeza, euforia... O background de todos os personagens, como eles são apresentados, o que eles realmente são, e o porque são aquilo que são... enfim!

Outro quesito que achei que não tinha como ficar melhor: os testes. O desafio ficou maior, as possibilidades de encontrar a solução aumentaram, e os elementos novos tornaram tudo ainda mais criativo. E pra fechar, ainda fizeram uma campanha coop, que, de novo, ficou desgraçada de boa!

Por fim, você me pergunta: são por estes motivos que esse jogo é um dos melhores da sua vida? E minha resposta é: sim. Esse jogo fez parte dela. Poucos jogos eu tenho carinho e admiração, e este é um deles. Pode ser que você discorde de mim, mas como mais de 66 mil pessoas concordam comigo, eu acho que razão pelo menos eu tenho. Hahaha!

Одна из самых лучших игр столетия. Самых лучшая головоломка века и одна из самых лучших игр Valve. Игра подходит для людей любящих работать головой. Это игра для тех, кто хочет отдохнуть от привычного мира и погрузится в мир новых технологий. Это игра подойдёт как для подростка, так и зрелых людей. Я советую всем пройти первую и второю части этой замечательной игры. 

One of the best games of the century. Popular Puzzle century and one of the best games of Valve. The game is suitable for people who like to work head. This game is for those who want a break from the familiar world and plunge into the world of new technologies. This game is suitable for both teenagers and mature people. I advise everyone to go through the first and second part of this great game .

Recuerdo muy bien cuando compre este juego que me estaba aventurando en terrenos desconocidos. Lo tenia como un buen juego por amigos que me lo habian recomendado, pero no fue hasta que me lo descargue que vi lo que en verdad era. Este juego es simplemente GLORIOSO, no hay manera de describirlo mejor. Tiene una de las mejores historias desde mi punto de vista, la jugabilidad es completamente fluida mejorando mecanicas del 1 y metiendo nuevas como los geles, mantiene el sistema de mapas personalizados de la comunidad y añade algo que, les juro, es hermoso, que es el multijugador, que mantiene TODO Portal 2 Singleplayer y lo vuelve completamente para 2. Lo compre en 2012, y para mi, sigue siendo una compra completamente obligatoria, y por los precios que lo dan en las ofertas, por favor, si no lo tenes hacete un favor y compralo, que te prometo que no te va a decepcionar. 10/10.

Portal 1 was basically everything and had to be and nothing it didn't. For being so focused, it was essentially the perfect experience.

Portal 2 takes Portal 1 and adds some new concepts. That alone would make it bigger, however this game doesn't have that same "focused" philosophy that the first Portal did. They wanted to create a longer experience and some padding was done because of it. Many times in the game you'll find yourself walking from test chamber to test chamber through the architecture of Aperture Science's walls. I appreciated going "behind the scenes" in the first game, but in this game it arguably detracts from the experience after a point.

However, a Portal game is still a Portal game and the puzzles that you do go through are all pretty great. As a whole, I still think the game shines--there's just tiny specks in between that fall short.

You'd think I'd end my review here and say that it's worth recommending, but Portal 2 is more than just its singleplayer campaign.

New to this sequel is a 2-player co-op mode with FOUR portals, 2 between each player. This is where the real value of the game lies, because there are tons of user-made maps that you can play through with your friends.

With this in mind, I'd DEFINITELY recommend this game--especially to the people who think that the co-op thing is up their alley.

Portal 2 co-op is incredible, and enhanced by the free (!) DLC Peer Review. No other co-op game has put me in a situation where I needed to coordinate and communicate with my partner like this one. Add to this a solid single player campaign with characters like Cave Johnson and Wheatley, and you have a winner on your hands.

GREAT GAME, had lots of fun playing it. Awesome physics and mechanics, great levels designs and gameplay. Didn't stay stuck for too long on any stage which made the game enven more enjoyable. Something that I really enjoy was the humor and the sarcasm in every scene (well done). There is only one down-side to the game: it is quite short (beated the co-op and single player in about 15h), but that is understandable, due to the fact that such great effort went to making every stage. I highly recommand this game, more specifically to people who love platformers and strategy game. I don't regret anything about this purchase, a couple of nights (even days) of fun. Once again, GREAT GAME.

Portal 2 is one of the best games I've ever played. 

I'm not much into video games in general, but after a sudden decision to join Steam and purchase the game that my friend talked about a bunch, I played it. I beat the game within a few days (would have been hours but I work a part time job that required my attention more than the game did), and it felt great. Definitely worth the purchase!

Мультиплеер, милейшая робот-злодейка Glados о которой слышали все, интересные уровни, качественная графика, и Челл "немая сумасшедшая", а Русский перевод просто космос. Перед прохождением второй части, лучше пройти первую, так как многое может быть непонятно (первая часть очень отстает от второй, я себя буквально заставлял её проходить, а этот ужасный голос Glados мне просто сверлил мозг, как хорошо что вторая часть это исправила) вобщем всем советую 10/10.

Отличная игра для тех, кто хочет пошевелить своими мозгами. Вам придется много думать и ловко проходить уровни и при этом - тут есть даже сюжет! Также можно поиграть со своим другом или со случайным напарником и вместе с ним проходить уровни, в которых есть 5 эпизодов(1 - легкий, 5 - хардкор).
Русский язык полностью адаптирован под эту игру - от субтитров и интерфейса до диалогов и криков сторожевых машин. 

Игра для тех, кто умеет думать.

Portal2はストーリーだけでなく、映像などにも面白さがあり、ワークショップを使用し、チェンバーの共有ができるのもいいところだと思います。また、そのチェンバー製作に使用するpuzzle makerは分かりやすく簡単にコースが作れるのもいいと思いました。前作のSource Engineよりも"完全オリジナルゲーム感"があるところもいいと思いました。

[spoiler]その他にもネタがたくさんあるのもいいと思いました[/spoiler]
